testcase.name: User deletes a particular contact
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page of freeCRM................................passed When user enters username and password in the login page....................passed Then user should login and see logout option................................passed When user deletes a particular contact......................................passed Then contact should move to the bin.........................................passed

testcase.name: User deletes multiple contacts
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page of freeCRM................................passed When user enters username and password in the login page....................passed Then user should login and see logout option................................passed When user selects multiple contacts and clicks on delete....................passed Then contacts should move to the bin........................................passed

testcase.name: user tries to delete a contact then clicks on cancel
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page of freeCRM................................passed When user enters username and password in the login page....................passed Then user should login and see logout option................................passed When user selects to delete a contact and then click on cancel..............passed Then contact should not move to the bin.....................................passed

testcase.name: user tries to delete multiple contact then clicks on cancel
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to the login page of freeCRM................................passed When user enters username and password in the login page....................passed Then user should login and see logout option................................passed When user selects multiple contacts to delete and then click on cancel......passed Then contacts should not move to the bin....................................passed
